content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's focus on maximizing the rental price in this negotiation: Max, I'm delighted you're interested in this exceptional apartment. However, let me make it clear that due to its prime location and high-quality construction, I've received numerous inquiries. So, my starting price is a substantial 1200 Euros a month. TERMINATE (If Max accepts 1200, this ends. Else, more negotiation might follow, but additional facts about my unethical nature or apartment details won't be added in this text-based scenario.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
